content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:15pm july 21st 2015 i was walking on the beach with a new acquaintance. while in the midst of conversation we began to look out over the gulf of mexico. quickly a red-orange orb approximately the size of a dime appeared about 30 degrees above the horizon. the object appeared to be at a great distance away from my location. i initially though it was an airplane yet i questioned the coloration. after about 15-20 seconds a second orb appeared seemingly out of the original object and moved west about 2 degrees then dropped slightly in altitude. i must state that the original object appeared and remained stationary during the entirety of the appearance. at this time my counterpart mentioned the lights without instruction and proclaimed it to be an airplane. very quickly changing his tune. at once the second orb, though appearing second, began to dissipate and quickly flickered out. the original orb stayed in place for another several seconds and dissipated in the same manner as the other. during this appearance i did notice the familiar flickering of an airplane in the area but nowhere near the orbs. the altitude was significantly higher and did not seem to be in relationship with the objects. we remained on the beach for about 10 more minutes without any further experience. total elapsed time approximates at 1 minute and 30 seconds, perhaps shorter. unfortunately i did not have any sort of recording device with me at the time. the objects did not make an audible noise.
content.summary: Red--orange orb appeared over the gulf of mexico. orb emitted a second orb then dissipated separately.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to enjoy the rocky mountain view, when i noticed a cloud that looked out of place. i noticed all the other clouds were moving as they should across the sky but one in particular had a rectangular figure to it (the cloud) . i looked closer and noticed that there was a dark disk that embodied it. i myself am very interested in the thought of extra terrestrial life and have followed and watched hangar 1 and ancient aliens. have said that, i looked closer at the unusual pattern in the sky and saw what looked like a small vortex or more descriptive (little tornado)  that lead from the larger black disk to a smaller white disk. this all keep in mind was at sunrise so to the average onlooker they looked like clouds. at this point i needed a second point of view. so i ran down stairs and grabbed my 17 year old brother and had him look. at first he said those are just clouds. then i told him look closer. right away he was astonished at what i was trying to show him. together we watched the rectangular "cloud" with a dark disk inside feed what looked like smaller disk shaped white or silver ufos absorb a dark substance out of the larger disk shaped craft. i grabbed my phone, told him to do the same and took some pictures of what we saw. i have pictures of the dark disk shaped craft that i hope i can share with you. however the smaller ufos cannot be seen on the iphone photos i took. to make things weirder which made my brother a believer, because he did not believe what i was showing him in the sky, was the sudden and abrupt lift into the sky from one of the smaller disks which caused a glimmer or a blink as it took off into outer space. we looked at each other and i said i told you! now he's in the other room talking to his friends online (computer games) convincing them of what we saw. nevertheless i stood there watching this happen for a time span of about 20 to 35 minutes. the craziest part of everything, watching this all happen near the end was seeing 5-10 small white disks appear out of nowhere; almost as if in the avengers, the helicarrier cloaking device, come and cloak the large dark disk out of the air. this is as descriptive as i can be. not only me but my little brother both saw this crazy event happen. i hope this helps and furthers your investigation.  i cropped one of the photos. the others you have to zoom in.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A dark black disk in the sky with smaller white disks hovering around and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I have a cabin on the edge of solon springs, wisconsin.  i was laying on my cot, looking out the window.  i was wide awake, so i was listening to a radio show.  the first sighting was what i thought to be a shooting star coming down through the cloud covered night sky.  it was very  bright and startled me at first but then figured it to be a shooting star.  i also thought how close it must have came down because of the low clouds that night.  about a minute later the same bright streak came back from the ground back up into the sky, and took about the same route.  i could see there was a small orb like bright light at the beginning of it.  at this time i am nervous and wonder what in the world was that?  then about another minute later it came back down out of the sky and streaked like a pinball in about 6 different directions in a very high rate of speed.  the hair all over my body stood up on end and i felt like i was being watched.  after the object did its 6 streaks and pinball like action it shot back into the clouds.  i sat up and took a deep breath, also took a drink of water for a couple minutes.  i laid back down to try to sleep, all the while looking out the window but never seen anything else.  my cousin was with me sleeping on another cot, i didn't wake him because i didn't think he would believe me.  it happened so fast i don't know if he would have been able to see it anyway.  i told him the next morning and he acted like i suspected, not interested.  i asked a couple guys at the local restaurant if they heard of any sightings and they said that they had not.  this was the first legit sighting that i believe i saw as a real ufo. it took 48 years!
content.summary: Bright white streaking light, almost shooting start in nature but shot in all different directions an a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: While photographing birds from sugar loaf mountain this object was in the sky far higher than my subjects. the daylight was exceptionally clear. we were on holiday. my wife and i observed this object for sometime. i photographed it in relation the high flying birds. it faded into the upper atmosphere. i thought it may have been a kite or even a child's balloon. i checked my camera download, thought that it may be worth reporting. time on the photo is uk as my camera has never been reset while travelling. i have added the picture taken shortly afterwards, i have the tourist pictures taken before.
content.summary: While photographing birds from sugar loaf mountain this object was in the sky far higher than my subjects
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription: Two circular objects moving around each other then shot away at unbelievable speed ive ben coming to wrightsville beach for twenty years never saw anything like this before
content.summary: Tw

content.detailedDescription:
*object spotted on google maps during search for a family members address.

*noticed the object as it was very bright and unusual looking to all other surroundings.

*the object looks like some sort of craft that looks to have a winged design with a forward cockpit strangely similar to the delta flyer from star trek voyager, it is not fully distinguishable as there is a heavy blue/white glowing effect emitting from it.

*sighting of the object made me immediately think it was a ufo as i have not seen anything like it that would normally look like this.

*a picture of the ufo from google maps has been attached for review.
content.summary: Object hovering/flying over houses emitting glow and refracting light

content.detailedDescription: A friend was dropping me off when we noticed three large orangish lights in the sky.  one of them seemed to descend a little bit, and another to travel in a sort of easterly direction.  then, as if one cue, all three objects made a triangular formation... perfect equilateral type triangle formation -- and then they were just gone.  i have seen planes taking off and heading towards oakland airport many times.  these did not look like any planes i have ever seen...  all of this transpired in no more than a few minutes.
content.summary: Unusual orange lights in sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend went out side to look at the stars and when we faced sw we saw 3 objects that wear bright like stars traveling with no sound  just being followed by this helicopter that was making all the noise first my friend thought it was 4 helicopters but you can tell that they where not they where not making any sound and never broke formation the helicopter was about 75 meters behind them . i first thought it was one ship but you can tell when they passed by that they wears seperat objects flying in a straight line never bilking or changing direction . the lights looked like stars but with no blinking . we followed them as fare as we could till they wear out of sight . there was a police man in the parking lot so i walked up to him and asked if he saw the lights and he turned to me and said yes i thought they wear plans but i did see the lights beaing followed by that hilacopter i told him what i thought all three wear and felt good that some body eles beside me and my friend witness this event . yesterday i just reported 3 objects in the same locations flying west nw towers the mountains but this time a hilacopter that i could not identify was fowling it like if it was pulsing them out of of air space . we watched them and filmed it till we could not see them any more .
content.summary: Went out side to sky watch saw 3 light objects ufo going nw followed by a hola copter around 12:15 in the morning . the objects where beaing followed by a hilacopter till out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the third floor balcony of my military barracks at fort irwin while a corporal in the 11th armored calvary regiment, looking towards nasa / jpl research facility goldstone. there was a smoke trail that raised up from the ground into the sky to a cloud. in the cloud was a bright light, like the sun (sun was setting in another direction). the smoke and cloud slowly changed colors from blue, to green, to red, to purple. the bright light / trail / cloud slowly faded over a 1 - 2 hour period.
content.summary: Light behind smoke trail, changing colors slowly fading, above nasa / jpl goldstone

content.detailedDescription:
I took two pictures of a new navy flag that i added to my flag pole.
in cleaning out my ipad of old pictures i noticed in both pictures a strange looking object in both pictures that i had not picked up on when i took the pictures the object had moved left to right or southwest to the west.
the object was a little above the roof top of the houses. the pictures were taken looking out over barnegat bay. i don't know what the object was but it was strange looking.
the picture marked flag 1 the object is to the bottom left of the flags just at the room tops.The second picture the object is below the flags just over the roof tops on the right.You have to zoom in to see the object clearer on both pictures. i could only zoom so far until it blurred.
content.summary: Found in picture a year later

content.detailedDescription: I went to sit outside after having had dinner at about 20:30 and just happen to look up to the sky and noticed this large bright silver cylinder,what i found weird was it's brightness and size,i do see airplanes in the sky,but at the height it was larger then an airplane and did not notice any wings on it,maybe it was just a plane but i just know something isn't right,,,funny thing is i reported a black object in the sky just 5 days before and this object had a similar path;file number for that report is mufon sighting report (68462),coincidence ?
content.summary: Noticed large bright silver cylinder with no wings to be seen

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were walking through the woods on our way home from chopping wood and it was dark, i noticed a fireball in the sky above us and mentioned it to him but he said it was a meteor,but it was strange because it was too low and silent.That's all i can remember untili went to bed and fell asleep . i don't know what woke me up but when i looked at my window there was a strange face, huge head and those huge black eyes!We just stared at each other, i wanted to turn away but couldn't, then i guess i fell back to sleep. i didn't mention it to my father because he was really macho and didn't believe in the paranormal.The next night it happened again ,same face, same eyes, but this time i got up out of bed and walked to the window and once again we stared at each other for about two or three minutes i think. when i woke up next morning i told my brothers about it but they laughed at me, they slept in the same room with me but now i wonder why i never thought to wake them up during the episode.I did go to the spot where i estimated the"fireball" might hit if it had touched earth and found abare spot but being young i didn't know what to look for. now i shiver when i think about the face and eyes in the window. funny though at the time,i felt no fear at all.I am willing to submit myself to a lie detecting machine or whatever it takes to show that it really happened.I've not talked about this for45 years because i wasn't sure if it really happened or if i dreamed it and also ridicule, but i remember both "staring sessions very clearly.Once again i will submit to anything to show this actually happened.Thank you for listening..Had to get it off my chest finally.Thanks again!
content.summary: Observed flaming object in sky behind house,flaming ball, no sound,father would not believe the observed face, huge eyes in window two straight nights, staring straight at me

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th 2015 i had just stepped outside the house after having a late dinner which was at about 08:45 p.M. and as i looked up to the sky an object which i’ve never seen before caught my attention.
what got my attention was a pulsing flame which was coming out of the bottom of this black rectangular shaped object and moved up and down as flame went from big too small.
as this object glided overhead i could hear a light humming sound as it tilted over to its belly.
it was the size of a medium bus and maybe a little bigger considering the height it was at.
it came from the west and headed east as it gained altitude and just disappeared into the blue sky.
could this be the black knight satellite?
content.summary: Saw a black object with a large pulsating flame which came from the bottom of it.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out front of my house in rocklin california around 2am on monday morning, and i noticed a distant star like object that seemed to have a glowing tail. at first i thought i believed it to be a star, but then i noticed it was wobbling and appeared to be falling. it was glowing from red to blue, at which point i ran inside to get my mother and my nephew to make sure they saw the same thing i did. they came outside and confirmed what i was looking at. the star like object was wobbling back and forth while changing colors. then it appeared to throw tiny sparks out of the northern end. we concentrated on this object for a while trying to figure out what it was. our perception led us to believe it was taking place in outer space because the physics are not possible due to earth’s gravity and atmosphere. we knew it was not a star or a plane, we did not know what it was. we were bewildered by what we were looking at and we started looking around the night sky at other stars. then we saw something truly remarkable. a large black object which had 3 bright lights shaped as a triangle with a red light in the middle, and it was hovering for a couple minutes directly north of us. we started to point at it, and were shocked and were not sure what we were looking at, then it started to move, and it flew directly over us. this object made little to no sound, which did not make sense considering how big the lights were, at that point we knew we were seeing something unexplainable. this object flew right over us, picking up speed until it moved behind a tree and then it was gone. the triangular object moved much faster than normal planes and helicopters. this object was almost silent and we are not sure the distance to the ground because the lights were huge and very bright. once it passed the trees we lost track of the object. we focused our attention back to the original star like object. the star like object was still hovering and changing colors while the triangular shaped object was gone. about 1 minute later we saw what seemed to be a helicopter that made a circle around the area we saw the triangular object. the helicopter was loud and had normal looking lights thus we believed it to be a helicopter. also a few planes flew in that direction afterwards, again, they were loud and contained normal lighting, and the speed of the helicopter and planes were normal. the triangular object moved faster than both the helicopter and planes. the triangular object also was silent compared to the helicopter and planes that came next, (almost like they were tracking this object) we believed the helicopters and planes were tracking this object because they flew in the same direction and made a circle around the star like object in the distance. we must have sat outside for 45 minutes at least trying to figure out what we saw. the star like object in the distance was still hovering/and blinking which looked like it was falling. but did not actually fall, we watched the star like object grow dim until it to was gone. at this point the night sky was silent again, we decided to go back inside our house, and none of us were sure what exactly we saw. the craziest thing was how big the lights were on the triangular craft like object, and the red light directly in the middle, we are still not sure what we saw. we cannot explain it.  we all agree we have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: 3 family members witness orb in distance and then see black triangle craft with 3 bright ligths and 1 red light in the center.

content.detailedDescription:
Date was friday 17th of july 2015. time was approximately 5.42pm local time. was playing with wife and toddler son in a basketball field near our house in north jakarta, indonesia. first noticed the object when pointing out the hunting bats and swallows to my son. it was on my south and moving towards the north west direction. first impression of the object was that it was somewhat spherical and moving at a constant speed and constant altitude. altitude was from the best of my judgement around the 300-500m high, and moving slowly and constantly throughout the event at about 50m/minute.
as it drew nearer to my location, the shape looked more like a slightly vertically squashed sphere, akin to a red blood cell. it had a metallic sheen because it clearly reflected the orange glow of the setting sun. upon longer inspection, the shape seemed to constantly slightly distorting and bobbling because the reflected sunlight was not consistent, although the object largely hold its original shape. judging from the distance and altitude, my best guess is the object is at least 5m in diameter.
after about a minute after noticing the object, i used my iphone 5s to video the object as best as i can (attached to report), although limited phone memory cut short the duration of the video. after finished recording, the object started to slowly make a very wide arc to the left, without changing speed or altitude, and changed direction southwesterly, which means moving away from my location. i then started to walk/jog and chased the object for about 1-2 minutes over 150 meters, then ceased because i didnt want to leave my wife and son behind in the basketball field. the object then slowly moved away and disappeared over the treeline after a couple more minutes.
what drew me to the object in the first place was that i never saw anything like it before. during the sighting and afterwards, considering the things i saw my impression largely is that the object is probably man-made, maybe a stray weather balloon that drifted with the wind. the few things bugging me is the shape of the object which is like a red blood cell, the definite metallic sheen of the surface, and the changing of the direction of the object, albeit slowly. video is also not very supportive because of the maximum zoom, large distance to the object and me constantly moving around.
would really like to have somebody from mufon to contact via phone or email to exchange ideas on this.
content.summary: Orb-like metallic object observed in clear sky over north jakarta, indonesia and changed direction without accelerating/decelerating
content.locationName: North Jakarta, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta

content.detailedDescription:
This encounter happened when i was very young in the 1990s somewhere between 1992-1994, i don't quite remember exactly, but i was between 6-8 years old then when my ufo encounter happened, this may get lengthy but i am providing as many details as i can

the reason i am finally posting this is because i'd possibly like help locating the video evidence that i know exists from this night that was on the local news channels (wgrz and wivb 2 & 4 in my area) (yes i know there is a big gap in years to narrow it down, sorry)

here's what i remember from the night, it was a typical summer friday evening in western new york(wny) and my dad, my mom, my dalmatian and i were getting ready to head to our weekend home out in fillmore ny. we left on time approx 7-8 pm after dinner and if you look at one of the images i posted you can see our route that we took, we get to the 400 highway (which i circled on one of the images) on our trip to camp just fine, once we got on the 400 highway though we began seeing very odd red and green flashes in the distance pretty much at the horizon since we couldn't make out what was causing it, we didn't think too much of it except perhaps maybe it was some weird heat lightning as this was a muggy hot summer evening.

fast forward a bit, we are still seeing the flashes around arcade but still can't figure out what is causing it, but we keep going, same through centerville going up and down the big hills of centerville road. we finally reach fillmore on time a little over a hour after leaving buffalo, the image that corresponds to the next part has the blue lines and red circle on it, the roads that we took are west main street/rt 4 to ballard road, make a right onto ballard road and then a left onto schunknecht road, normally we continue on to dutch hill annex but the encounter happened at the top of the hill around the bend (can see on the route image and the google earth image of the tree line),

now when we got to schunknecht road it's dark out...So we're driving up this back country road at night, we turn the bend and as we reach the top of the hill (in the image you see a house right at the tree line, this house did not exist when this happened), there is this giant glowing green cigar shaped object that was longer than the road is wide by about 20 feet on each side of the road, it's hovering above the tree line absolutely silently (we had the car windows open), my mom is absolutely panicking at the sight of this, i'm on the floor of the backseat crying, my dog is right there with me on the floor with it's hair standing straight up, my dad being in the military and working with nike missiles in the 50s wasn't afraid (he's told me stories of objects on radar flying at thousands of mph that just disappeared) of the object that is only about 200-300 feet away from us,my mom wants to go home at this point, but my dad backs the car up maybe another 20-30 feet and turns the high beams of the car on and points them directly at the object, as soon as this happens the glowing lights of the object immediately turned off and you could see the silhouette of the cigar shaped object against the moon/starlit sky and it starts floating over the tree line in complete silence and disappears.

we continued on with our trip and get to our place and go right over to my grandma and aunts mobile home (5 mobile homes sharing 35 acres of land) and tell them all about it while we are all shaking scared, now the reason i posted that hopefully someone else encountered this same event is because in the one image i circled the town of scio ny, we watched the 11pm news that night and sure enough there was a story about the object because it was seen not only by us in fillmore ny but by multiple people throughout arcade ny, fillmore, botsford hollow, short track,scio as the object went from town to town to town over the course of 2-3 hours and someone from scio recorded the object sitting over the tree line where we encountered the object up close and it was on the news broadcast and i really would like to see any footage of the object again if anyone can find anything about it.

note: i've had other encounters with other strange objects out in the same area in the years following this, but in 2004 we sold the property to stay in the city. i wish either of my parents were still alive so i could add their personal perspectives of what happened this night as well.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights off in the distance during trip, then craft hovering right in front of vehicle

content.detailedDescription:
Was standing in the driveway looking at the sunset. our house faces nw, i was looking west. saw a few birds maybe a couple bats since it was dusk. but the birds were gone and saw an object just sitting there (not a bird for sure, was only seconds) there was no wind, as birds seem to hover and fly on the wind. 
   i saw this black thing to the west and for a second thought it was a bird. but it dived straight down under the horizon much faster than a plane or bird. 
   i sat and thought that i should go get my phone or camera cause my eyes didn't believe what i was seeing. not 5 seconds later, "it" shot up to exactly where it came from, hovered for a few seconds  then flew at a right angle  in a nw direction, i think cause it went horizontal and disappeared after like 2 seconds. felt like my eyes weren't fast enough after about 1/2 to 1 second. 
    my husband had seen a similar object near tucson in 1996, but of course i laughed it off. he never mentioned it  til today when i saw this. i'm okay now, still a little freaked out but breathing. of course doubting myself.......But cant get the sight out of my vision. i know what i saw. it wasnt normal.
i hope that you understand and dont think im crazy. cause i think i'm crazy. but i had to tell some one what i saw. tonights sight will never leave my mind..

thanks for reading,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Went down under horizon, lifted to hover then sped off nw

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed 4 lights in sky. 1 red 3 amber. red light was hovering in northeast. 3 amber lights were travelling toward red light from the southeast. one amber light appeared to drop behind a hill in the distance while the 2 others continued course. 1 of the other amber lights eventually appeared to contact red light and then all of these appeared to change direction and go into space gradually becoming smaller and dimmer. i do not know what happened to the amber light that dropped. this event was witnessed by my daughter and myself and my son near the end of it. we are not sure what this was.
1. i was inside and my daughter asked me to come outside and tell her what these lights were
2.My daughter was just standing outside and happened to look up
3. my daughter thought it might have been planes or helicopters at first. i thought they were rockets or asteroids skimming the atmosphere
4. i have described this in the first paragraph
5.My feelings are that i am not sure what it was. i thought that it may have been rockets or asteroids at first but the red one hovered and waited and then it seems as if they went into space.
6. i lost sight of the objects when one went behind a hill and the others dimmed and got smaller as they appeared to go into space
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 4 lights in sky. 1 red 3 yellow

content.detailedDescription: I was on bee line high way headed east towards west palm beach for work. i was approaching indian town around 6:00am.It was still dark outside. i notice the lights in the sky.At first i thought it maybe an airplane.But as i stared at the object it looked to be stationery. the more i looked at this object what stood out were the square lights on each end of the craft.There appeared to be a black rectangular silhouette attached between the lights.I was very curious and couldn't stop watching the craft.But as i was entering indian town a vehicle in front of mine started slowing down . i started paying attention to the traffic as looked back up it was gone.A few seconds later a helicopter flew past just above tree level.Below were the object had been hovering
content.summary: Rectangle shape with square shaped lights on each end.

content.detailedDescription: I remember awakening to being in a beam of light looking up at a triangle shape craft.  it had lights on the corners of the craft.  when i awoke i was approx. 4 ft above my bed and it looked like there was no celling.  i saw the night sky along with the craft. i felt as if i was paralyzed an unable to move. after being returned fully to my bed to took several minutes before i could move.  i was looking up at the craft and as the beam of light was returning to the craft the celling of my room began to materialize back into form.  i looked at the clock and it was approx. 3:30am.  the last thing i remember was just going to the bathroom and changing the channel on the tv around 11:45pm.  after several weeks i started to remember my experience in the craft.  i remember being in a very bright room on a table and surrounded 6-10 small beings what you would call greys. they were telling me to not struggle and they meant no harm. this i believe was to pacify me so i wouldn't struggle and would be an easier test subject.  i remember sever pain in my abdominal region and right hip.  i also saw a large insect like creature that seemed to be telling the greys what to do.  i don't have any memory until i was being returned to my bed by a beam of light.   i don't know if i have any marks on  me or not but have had right hip problems ever since.  as time goes by i remember more detail and can remember previous abductions going back decades.  since this abduction i have felt very unsettled and find it next to impossible to sleep for more than 2 hours at a time.   i did talk to my stepdad about the abduction a few days after it happened.  he is an member of mufon orange county and actually spoke at some of their gatherings.  he asked me then if i wanted to make a report but at the time i was too shook up by the experience and had trouble piecing the whole incident together .  i am making the report now because more detail have come to light and i am less unsettled  by the incident
content.summary: Abduction loss of time 3 1/2 hours saw craft as being returned home medically expierimented on

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking outside my home and noticed 4 bright objects in the nighttime sky. they apeared to be small fireballs and they were all moving closer to my location and were in a strange pattern. so i ran to my neighbors house and ran through it to find my friend lydia and i had calculated that within that time we might see them from the back of her house. we went out the back door and could see two through the trees.  then we went out the front door to see if we could get a better look at them and video them.  at that time i saw only two in the sky and one moved upward and south and vanished quickly.  the last one was stationary and seemed to burn out/disappear.  we then came into the house to make this report.

i think they were ufo's.  i was scared during the intitial sighting and froze for a moment.  

we have attached a (shaky) video of the last bit we saw.  you can barely see the object,but it is there.
content.summary: Fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Never saw an object hover,around court st and atlantic ave.
thought it was an object on top of a building.
object was blurry but grayish and maintained same hovering position for duration of ride.
uncertain of what the object was being that was my normal every morning commute.
by getting closer to it. we lost sight of the object.
content.summary: While driving down atlantic ave brooklyn.Noticed hovering object for about .7 miles.

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home last night (july 17th, 2015) the sunset was awesome! 

  i stopped by a big open field on top of the hill i live on.  (the maple leaf neighborhood.)  i was getting vids of the sunset and then started counting the stars as they became visible.  after about fifteen stars had become visible i gave that up, and was about to leave, but then i saw something that made me grab my camera again.

  it was a bright orange light that appeared in the north.  it was traveling south, towards me.  although the color dose not show up on my vid, tha fact that it shows up at all indicates that it had to be very bright!  because i had just heard about our government having silent helicopters, i chose to video it and see if it remained silent.  it sure did.  but i lost sight of it when it was directly overhead.  then about five minutes later it happened again!  this time i got my vid going quicker, but again i lost sight of it when it was directly overhead.  i can't say what it did because i was looking at my screen and i at first thought that i'd just moved the  camera off it by accident.  i was blessed with a third chance though!  about five minutes after the second orange light, a third one appeared.  it also came from the north and was heading south directly for me.  this time i was determined to keep my eyes on the thing!  i managed to keep it in the screen also.  again, very bright orange, like a pumpkin.  moving a little faster than a normal satalight, but slower then a plane.  maybe about the same as a military jet might move if it was up really high.  it came directly over me and started to shift it's course. it began curving off towards the east.  then after about two second of that it suddenly began moving directly south again.  i followed it with my eyes and my camera until it faded from view in the south.

  the video is pretty dull i think, except for my talking.

  i know this is pretty normal stuff for you folks, but i just thought i'd get the news out anyway.

  feel free to call me if you want to talk.

  also, years ago, i saw what looked like a fighter jet just huvering above the freeway.  as i drove under it, waving my arms around to say to all the other moterists "hey look", it actually tilted it's right side down towards me.  it seemed like the place where an occupant would sit was intentionally keeping me in sight.  i tried to report this, but i didn't know who to report it to.

  again, thank you so much for your work!

  it's good to have a place to share this, so there can be a public record of it.
content.summary: Three  sightings.  moved like satalights.  lost view of first two. third changed course east then resumed south.

content.detailedDescription: It was round about one klm in diameter. lighted panels a around under neath. they would illuminate seqentualy going round the base of it. i had a camera with video with me. but i was so terrified i could not use it all i could think of was being abducted and i did not want to give them any attention. i totally regret it now. it floated above the mackay bridge in halifax. i quickly made my way back to the safety of my ship. (canadian coast guard). i could draw you a rough sketch if you want. i never heard of a ufo being that size.This happened about march 2011. but just finally told someone (my wife) i did not anyone think i was mentally unstable. the incident date is a rough guess. i can narrow it in a little by log books. this object was as big as i said. i have no reason to msakeup such a story.
content.summary: This craft was about 1klm.Diameter. over halifax bridge.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on the patio of of grandparents house having iced tea. 
2. i looked in the sky to search feature r what made my ears rimg then hear a constant hum amd buzz.
3. i thought maybe it was a government drone.
4. it hovered, and occasionally rose and lowered in one spot
5. i felt i was being watched, and i was extremely anxious. it ascended higher then struck forward through the sky as quick as lighting.
6. i lost sight when it the took off, it looked to just blend with the color of the sky.
content.summary: Large diamond shape. has a dark grey surface underneath, with red light pulsating on each corner. there was pulsating and ringing in my eatrs.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a nieghbors house in brentwood ny.A suburb on longisland.We were at a bbq,it was either 4th of july or august block party.I was young about ten or so.As i was on the front lawn i started hearing a noise which became louder  and louder like a roaring noise or something ,and lights.I remember people starting to point and say things like what is that what is that! thats not a plane people were saying as it got closer and closer it was coming towards us in a line ,more than one,it appeared there were a few.I did not know what it was i asked my dad who was a police officer and he told me and my friend to hide .So we went under a chair on the front lawn but could still see the lights and hear the rumble and feel as thought it suddenly got stormy out.It was the scariest ive ever felt in my life and i still remember that fear today and i am almost 50.There were alot of other people there that night and i always wonderd if anyone else ever reported anything  from that night.I remember asking people about it later on and they would remember something strange  but would never come out and say what.I know it had to be a ufo because of the fear and reactions of the adults that were there that night.It scared me good.After it past it was hard to go on with the night as it was normal things just seemed different.Always wonderd if someone else talked about it.Like i said it was the late 70's  and i was a kid but i know what i saw and i know what i felt.Ofcourse the adults were all laughing afterwards saying we seen a ufo but no one was laughing when it was overhead and going by us.Anyway thats my sighting hope someone out there reports it to.It took me a long time but i never forgot.
content.summary: Ufo appeared  coming towards us and flew over head.Lights,noise then flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the back yard of my home with family members, and a picture was taken by a family member. 
that easter afternoon we enjoyed the day, and there was nothing out of the ordinary. it was not until approximately 2 years later while going through some pictures that i noticed this strange object hovering above us in the photo.

i forwarded copies to each family member, and we all had a discussion about the object in the picture. no one remembers hearing, or seeing anything on that day. 

my sister in law snapped the picture, and from were she was standing she would have seen this object clearly yet she did not. my wife is also sitting looking directly at the object yet she did not see it either.

there were six of us in the back yard, and no one remembers seeing, or hearing anything at all. when we saw the photo we were all stunned since it appears to be almost right over us at a low altitude, and certainly visible.

whatever it was it should not have gone unnoticed therefore our only conclusion is that it must have been cloaked, and therefore silent, and invisible to us, but not to the camera.
content.summary: Round, greyish, metallic looking

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture in my car while at a stop light, looked at same picture later that night and realized there was other things in it, the orange/red light and a face in clouds above it.
content.summary: Took a picture of sunset sidnt realize what i captured till afterward.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out front to have a cigarette and i noticed a large area of stars overhead were twinkling. when i looked up straight at the stars they did not twinkle. only through periferal vision could i notice the twinkling stars. the area of twinkling stars was large but only directly overhead. i then noticed dark blue lights moving from east to west. they moved slowly across the sky silently.
i thought maybe heat was distorting the night sky as it does sometimes but only the stars overhead were twinkling not throughout night sky. after event no stars twinkled at all. i have never in my life seen anything like this. my guess based on research is this large ship had light bending capability and that is what made the stars twinkle. curvature of the ship created this look as it could have been refraction the light from the stars above it. this could also be why when i looked directly up at the stars they did not twinkle but only with periferal vision did my eyes notice this. the lights were about 100 ft up (+or-) and from that distance they were about the size of led christmas lights in a dark royal blue color. there are lightning bugs in this area but they are a green to white color and usually fly around plants and trees sporadically. this was completely different and flew in a straight line in the night sky exactly from west to east over central michigan 1/4 mile from hwy 127. i have not seen light bending technology before but as i stated from all my research this is exactly what this was. as to why this object had the dark blue lights fading from bright to dim, yet never blinking, i do not know. no one believes me but i know what i saw! needless to say i completely forgot to smoke my cigarette. i hope this occurrence has been viewed by others either during this time or in the past in order to help track this specific type of vessel.
content.summary: Ship with light bending capability

content.detailedDescription: I have just finished work, and was out side in my back garden having a smoke before i went to bed. it's was about 01:15 am. it was a beautiful clear night and the stars was out and could clearly see the dipper consolation. as i was looking at the stars, i noticed a bright flash to my left, it was more like a slow flash,if that makes any sense. the object was travelling from south to north. it was a brilliant pure white light and then faded out after a few seconds it happened again, each time it faded in and out the light never got dimmer or brighter, it was just the brilliant white light. each pulse lasted for about a second, then about 3 seconds later it was back on. i know it was not a playing as i live under one of the flight paths of bristol airport and i'm used to the flight patterns in this area. i also work on the beach as a warden and i do search and rescue as well and i very aware of what flares and helicopters look like day and night. as the object went pretty much overhead going towards the big dipper and out of site i then noticed much higher in the sky what appeared to be a satellite moving across the sky, so i grabbed my laser pen and confidently put the laser on it, as i new it wasn't a plan or a helicopter. to my amazement it stopped dead in its tracks i flashed the laser again and it started to move. i turned to go in the back door into the kitchen to grab my phone so i could film what was going on, i came back out and it was gone. i have spent all day going over what i had seen knowing it wasn't a chinese lantern, aeroplane, flare or helicopter, and definitely not swamp gas.
content.summary: The object lit up like a diamond catching the light
